altername_name: Heiwa Parlor! Pro - Fujiko ni O-Ma-Ka-Se Special
name: Heiwa Parlor! Pro: Fujiko Nio-ma-ka-se Special
overview: Heiwa Parlor - Pro Fujiko Nio-Ma-Ka-Se Special is a pachinko game that features 2 different pachinko machines and different levels of zoom. The main character of the game is Fujiko from Lupin the Third, published by Mitsui Bussan, which was released in Japan in 2000.
